title: Evaluating functions
text: Given the equation for a function, we should replace the input variable in the equation with the value provided and then calculate the result.

title: Replacement
text: Replace the variable x with -3, and we get $$f(-3)=\sqrt{2-\left(-3\right)}+5$$.

title: Calculation
text: Calculate the expression $$\sqrt{2-\left(-3\right)}+5$$. What do you get?
